name: Match 3 (matthewjosephtaylor)
description:
An endless match 3 / physics  game.

Relax. Unwind. Have a bit of fun. 

Recommend enabling audio if you have it muted.

How To Play: 

- When 3 or more tiles match  horizontally or vertically more tiles drop.  

- Click a tile to remove it (toggle  auto-click via middle mouse button).

- As you remove tiles, the other tiles will fall into matching configurations.

- The nominal goal is to improve your best time.

- There is no end. Play as long as you like.

- Other backgrounds, and  settings are available in the menu in upper-right of screen.
